perfume_data.description: On the enchanting island of Capri, two hearts race with the intoxicating magic of summer love. Hand in hand, skin warmed by the dazzling Mediterranean sun rays, their golden auras shimmer in the sun as they snatch playful kisses at every turn.
Inspired by the world of Alessandro Michele, enjoy this Platinum limited edition version of Gucci Pour Homme.
“Mandarine Basilic Harvest is a sparkling creation around a Marzolo mandarin that reveals a lively and exquisite bitterness," Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer.
Superhero is perfect for school and during sport.

Blu di Roma, a romantic, intense, and fresh fragrance inspired by the splendor of the blue shades of Roman summer, the enchantment of an adventure in the city that more than anything invites you to the dream of an endless holiday.

On the enchanting island of Capri, two hearts race with the intoxicating magic of summer love. Hand in hand, skin warmed by the dazzling Mediterranean sun rays, their golden auras shimmer in the sun as they snatch playful kisses at every turn.
Inspired by the world of Alessandro Michele, enjoy this Platinum limited edition version of Gucci Pour Homme.

Superhero is perfect for school and during sport.

Blu di Roma, a romantic, intense, and fresh fragrance inspired by the splendor of the blue shades of Roman summer, the enchantment of an adventure in the city that more than anything invites you to the dream of an endless holiday.
Shift onto the fast lane and enjoy the thrill with Coupé. Cut through the wind as you swish past, leaving a whirlwind of scents as fresh, sharp and memorable as your presence.
"With this fresh and luminous Eau de Parfum, today I give men the power to wear a rose. L'Homme À La Rose is my free interpretation of a rose for men," Francis Kurkdjian, Perfumer.
A perfume inspired by the first exhibition of Neon Art at the gallery La Maison Rouge, featuring fluoro art from the 1920's to today's love of the Day-glo.

Bond Street continues to be the preferred destination from major celebrities and has become a must for anyone visiting London. It is unrivaled in its combination between history and elegance. Hugh Parsons dedicates the new fragrance to this street, which is among the most important and elegant in the world.
Sultan Men Black is a cool and refreshing light floral scent with a masculine and mysterious magnetism.
inspired by the lively and colourful world of Pop Art. Luminous, fresh and optimistic.
Who loves the magic of the mystic world! This fragrance enchants all with a mysterious journey.
A pure expression of feminity: lively and fresh, vibrant and spicy, sensual and captivating. A signature scent as irresistible as women are.

Can you think of that cheerful and loyal friend we would all like to have? Huge head, big eyes, short limbs, and they’re bananas! Minions share some physical features with young children, making them connect especially well with their audience. They manifest pure emotions that are easily recognisable by them and make them laugh out loud, just like this fragrance!
She flutters and flounces lace, satin and more. Her spirit so sexy, bella's shop you'll adore. Slip sweetly into a lush, juicy fling. For a frill-seeking time "go on and ring".

On the enchanting island of Capri, two hearts race with the intoxicating magic of summer love. Hand in hand, skin warmed by the dazzling Mediterranean sun rays, their golden auras shimmer in the sun as they snatch playful kisses at every turn.

This charismatically sultry and bold fragrance empowers you with a fearless flair to find your truth and passionately pursue your authentic destiny. The alluring scent instantly ignites a surge of euphoric adrenaline and resilience, setting your soul on fire.
Impress with attitude and boldness.
An exquisite and refined fragrance that sublimates noble ingredients. A very powerful fragrance with an irresistible and addictive trail.
Rouat Ajial is a beautiful blend, wonderfully fresh and spicy at the beginning with a progression to velvety, woody warmth.
A sensual ambery scent valorising the complexity of agarwood.
Shift onto the fast lane and enjoy the thrill with Coupé. Cut through the wind as you swish past, leaving a whirlwind of scents as fresh, sharp and memorable as your presence.
"With this fresh and luminous Eau de Parfum, today I give men the power to wear a rose. L'Homme À La Rose is my free interpretation of a rose for men," Francis Kurkdjian, Perfumer.
A perfume inspired by the first exhibition of Neon Art at the gallery La Maison Rouge, featuring fluoro art from the 1920's to today's love of the Day-glo.

Bond Street continues to be the preferred destination from major celebrities and has become a must for anyone visiting London. It is unrivaled in its combination between history and elegance. Hugh Parsons dedicates the new fragrance to this street, which is among the most important and elegant in the world.
Sultan Men Black is a cool and refreshing light floral scent with a masculine and mysterious magnetism.
A fragrance for bold adventurers. Energetic. Significant. Explosive. This is Tabac Man Fire Power. A fragrance that stands for concentrated masculinity and strength.
This invigorating, electrifying fragrance mimics the sensation of salty skin coming out of the sea.

Its unique energy revitalises its fragrance heritage and updates the legend of sensual elegance, which it interprets with all the audacity of youth. This stimulant for the senses promises victory for one of the most irrepressible aspirations of man: seduction.
The classic elegance of tailored green leaves, the seduction of balmy ambery woods, and the energizing freshness of a fruity citrusy cocktail.
Egeo Beat is just like that immersive music you put on repeat: the contrast of the spicy notes against a creamy wood background will make you addicted to this beat.
